title: What Services does my phone support?
answer:
Your phone is a single-card multimode CSFB phone. Use of voice or data services depends on the type of card you install and the preset mode of your phone. 

 If a USIM card is installed, your phone can connect to a LTE/WCDMA/GSM network. If a SIM card is installed, your phone can connect to a WCDMA/GSM network. 

 Your phone chooses the LTE, WCDMA, and GSM in order of decreasing priority upon power-on. 

 Your phone registers with the LTE network in idle state. If leaving the LTE network, your phone registers with the WCDMA and GSM/GPRS/EDGE network. 

 You can set the preferred network mode to reduce power consumption and improve the standby time. 

 It is recommended that you subscribe to services such as missed-call reminder from your service provider to avoid inconvenience caused by missed calls.
